mapper.sql: QDD_ID, QD_ID, KEY_CODE, VAL, IS_DEFAULT, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_query_dim_detail_tb
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into ht_query_dim_detail_tb
QDD_ID,
QD_ID,
KEY_CODE,
VAL,
IS_DEFAULT,
OP_TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATOR_ID,
MODIFIER_ID,
#{qddId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{val,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ht_query_dim_detail_tb
QDD_ID = #{record.qddId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QD_ID = #{record.qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
KEY_CODE = #{record.keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VAL = #{record.val,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEFAULT = #{record.isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_query_dim_detail_tb set QDD_ID = #{record.qddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QD_ID = #{record.qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, KEY_CODE = #{record.keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VAL = #{record.val,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEFAULT = #{record.isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_query_dim_detail_tb
QD_ID = #{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
KEY_CODE = #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VAL = #{val,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where QDD_ID = #{qddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ht_query_dim_detail_tb set QD_ID = #{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, KEY_CODE = #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VAL = #{val,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where QDD_ID = #{qddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT KEY_CODE as 'name', VAL as 'value' FROM ht_query_dim_detail_tb WHERE OP_TYPE!='D' AND QD_ID = ( SELECT QD_ID FROM ht_query_dim_tb WHERE query_dim_code = "CHANNEL_TYPE" )
